post.text: Wow, did you just hear Bill Clinton's statement on how bad ObamaCare is. Hillary not happy. As I have been saying, REPEAL AND REPLACE!

comment.author: Alexandria
comment.text: Wasn't this the same healthcare plan Hillary tried so hard to implement in the 1990's, when Bill was in office?

replies.author: Derek
replies.text: Trashy Trump, your accountant Jack Mitnick said you don't have a clue about tax laws. He did all the work on your taxes and you never saw them until they were ready for your signature. You're just a dumb dumb bad business man with the emotional maturity of a hungry toddler. Why don't you drop out of this presidential race and cyber bully way late into the night until your simple mind is content.
